reapack.name: BW_AddSelectedSamplesToReaSamplomaticInstances.lua
reapack.desc: The purpose of this script is to basically create a sampler which behaves like a random container in an audio engine using reasamploatic500 and the round robin feature once you've created the sampler set up on a track using this script, you just need to add midi triggers to it in order to trigger a random sample from your selection

reapack.name: BW_BatchAutoRegion.lua
reapack.desc: This scripts job is to generate regions around selected items
